name: Docker Redmine
body:
# Zero to Redmine in 5 seconds or less*

```bash
docker run --name=redmine -it --rm -p 10080:80 \
sameersbn/redmine:latest
```

Point your browser to `http://localhost:10080` and login using the default username and password:
* username: admin
* password: admin

\* *download and start up times not included*
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
